beer.beer_description: Utilising NZ Necteron hop as its primary flavour driver, expect to find a strong stone and tropical fruit hop hit. Several hop additions are made during the fermentation process to build a layered and complex fruit driven experience. Large amounts of oats are used to build out the body creating a round soft texture.

items.checkin_comment: Delicious hazy. Lots of citrus with a low bitterness. Surprised my lager only friend liked this given the amount of flavour it has. I should have gone back for another.

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 150 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 31!

beer.beer_description: Utilising NZ Necteron hop as its primary flavour driver, expect to find a strong stone and tropical fruit hop hit. items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 100 distinct venues!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 495 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 100!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 280 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 57!

At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 25 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 6! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 40 distinct venues!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 95 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 20!

user.bio: Australia's leading beer expert, as voted by a panel of peers.
Born to share beers with good friends

items.badge_description:
Hoppy Hazy IPA Day!

The most popular modern style deserves its own day, right?

Well, that’s what Sierra Nevada thought last year and we couldn’t agree more! This year we’re jumping on the hazy day train with our first ever Hazy IPA Day Badge.

Several hop additions are made during the fermentation process to build a layered and complex fruit driven experience. Large amounts of oats are used to build out the body creating a round soft texture.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 285 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 58!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 175 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 36!

items.badge_description: One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 220 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 45!

beer.beer_name: Liquid Breeze Coconut, Vanilla, And Pinapple
